com.rohitsood.urlybird.mode
Interface Mode

All Known Subinterfaces:
GuiManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
GuiManagerImpl
public interface Mode

Specifies the mode of the application. Three modes are currently specified:
1. Online - This connects to the remote database via a network database server.
2. Offline - This works by connecting to a local database file bypassing all networking.
3. Server - This starts the network database server.
All classes implementing this interface should be mode-conscious. Every class that implements this interface must know the mode its running in.

Version:
1.1
Author:
Rohit Sood
